greetings: Welcome to Os Tres Motoqueiros do Apocalipse Verde
contextOTMAV: Os Tres Motoqueiros do Apocalipse Verde aim to help Mottu company with the problem of mapping motorcycles in their yards, using IoT technologies and an interactive map to chart the yard area, with the ability to separate customized sectors.
contextGithub: This is our organization for the project Os Tres Motoqueiros do Apocalipse Verde
